hotels.title: Secluded Ha Long Bay Bliss with Rooftop Bar, Infinity Pool, Spa, Onsen & Zipline
hotels.description: Heed the call of Ha Long Bay's famed emerald waters with a stay at this secluded paradise on the sands of Quan Lan Island. Surrounded by unspoilt tropical greenery and calm waters, this sprawling resort invites you to slow down - lounge by an expansive lagoon pool, unwind with treatments at Angsana Spa and Onsen or listen to the rhythmic hush of the tide along the pristine beach. Four exquisite restaurants and bars serve up satiating experiences, from authentic Vietnamese at Market Place to crafted cocktails with a view at The Sky Bar at the resort's peak. When adventure calls, get your thrills on Vietnam's first zipline, practice your putt on the mini golf course, take a kayak out or add a touch of elegance with a luxury cruise through the UNESCO-recognised Ha Long Bay.
